settings.page_description: Adjust preferences, review your KYC data and status, manage security settings, MultiSig Contracts and Wallet Connections

profile.page_description: Manage your basic account information. You can update your profile details, including name, email, password, and contact information.
profile.name: Name

edit_profile.page_description: Manage your basic account information. You can update your profile details and contact information.

wallets.page_description: Current connected wallets are shown below. You can connect one wallet per blockchain.
wallets.delete_wallet_modal_description: You have successfully removed the wallet address.
wallets.add_wallet_modal_description: You have successfully added a wallet address.
wallets.delete_wallet_message_warning: Do you want to delete this wallet?

newWalletModal.field_description: Enter the wallet address you want to integrate.

walletDetails.page_description: Current connected wallets are shown below. You can connect one wallet per blockchain.

asset_overview.page_description: View and manage your assets or create a new one

asset_details.page_description: Review asset details, public page data and KYC template status
asset_details.asset_note: This MultiSig Contract address has the roles of Asset Protection Manager, Token Supply Manager and Treasure.

public_page.title: Public Page
public_page.page_description: Update the information and media shown in your asset’s public page. Potential investors will be able to see all this information

transactions.page_description: This list shows a summary of all transactions, like acquiring and redemptions, as well related information. For more details, click on any of the transactions below.

kycApplication.page_sub_title: List containing investor’s KYC verification requests and their status. Click on Review to see each applicant detailed KYC data and approve or reject verification requests.
kycApplication.no_data: There are no KYC verification requests yet

opportunities.page_description: List of opportunities available for investment. Click on any of the opportunities below to see more details.
opportunities.no_data: There are no opportunities available for investment yet

errors.CORPORATE_ID_NOT_PRESENT_IN_USER: Corporate ID not present in user
errors.CANNOT_DELETE_ISSUER_FROM_ORGANIZATION: Can not delete an issuer from organization
